attributes.action: To not hide the the new covid-19 vaccine in are children's flu vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: Hiding a vaccine that has not been trailed for long enough in our children's annual flu jab is not acceptable. We as parents have the parental responsibility and will not let our children be used as test subjects.
attributes.background: We would like the government to not hide the new covid-19 trial vaccine in our children's flu vaccine. As parents we have the right to choose if we would like our children vaccinated on not.

rejection.details: There are no proposals for 'hidden' vaccines.
